<webParts>
  <webPart xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v3">
    <metaData>
      <type name="Microsoft.SharePoint.WebPartPages.DataFormWebPart, Microsoft.SharePoint, Version=15.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=71e9bce111e9429c" />
      <importErrorMessage>이 웹 파트를 가져올 수 없습니다.</importErrorMessage>
    </metaData>
    <data>
      <properties>
        <property name="InitialAsyncDataFetch" type="bool">False</property>
        <property name="ChromeType" type="chrometype">None</property>
        <property name="UseSQLDataSourcePaging" type="bool">True</property>
        <property name="Height" type="string" />
        <property name="CacheXslStorage" type="bool">True</property>
        <property name="XslLink" type="string" null="true" />
        <property name="AllowZoneChange" type="bool">True</property>
        <property name="AutoRefresh" type="bool">False</property>
        <property name="XmlDefinitionLink" type="string" />
        <property name="DataFields" type="string">


@Title,제목;@eApproval,eApproval;@aprStatus,상태;@approver1,검토자;@approver2,확인자;@approver3,심사자;@approver4,승인자;@reviewer,합의자;@referrer,참조자;@aprStatus1,검토결과;@aprStatus2,확인결과;@aprStatus3,심사결과;@aprStatus4,승인결과;@aprDate1,검토완료일;@aprDate2,확인완료일;@aprDate3,심사완료일;@aprDate4,승인완료일;@aprOpinion1,검토의견;@aprOpinion2,확인의견;@aprOpinion3,심사의견;@aprOpinion4,승인의견;@docNo,문서번호;@secureLevel,보안구분;@aprBody,내용;@aprResult,결재결과;@blankperson,blankperson;@eApproval_x0028_1_x0029_,eApproval;@_x0032_010,eApproval2010;@reviewStatus,합의상태;@submitted,submitted;@eApprova,eApproval2010New;@curApprover,현재결재자;@formname,양식명;@ID,ID;@ContentType,콘텐츠 형식;@Modified,수정된 날짜;@Created,만든 날짜;@Author,만든 사람;@Editor,수정한 사람;@_UIVersionString,버전;@Attachments,첨부 파일;@File_x0020_Type,파일 형식;@FileLeafRef,이름 (양식에 사용);@FileDirRef,경로;@FSObjType,항목 유형;@_HasCopyDestinations,복사 대상 있음;@_CopySource,복사 원본;@ContentTypeId,콘텐츠 형식 ID;@_ModerationStatus,승인 상태;@_UIVersion,UI 버전;@Created_x0020_Date,만든 날짜;@FileRef,URL 경로;@ItemChildCount,하위 항목 수;@FolderChildCount,폴더 하위 항목 수;@AppAuthor,앱 만든 사람;@AppEditor,앱 수정한 사람;</property>
        <property name="NoDefaultStyle" type="string">TRUE</property>
        <property name="ViewFlag" type="string">8</property>
        <property name="CatalogIconImageUrl" type="string" />
        <property name="ListUrl" type="string" null="true" />
        <property name="AutoRefreshInterval" type="int">60</property>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:x="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:dsp="http://schemas.microsoft.com/sharepoint/dsp" version="1.0" exclude-result-prefixes="xsl msxsl ddwrt" xmlns:ddwrt="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebParts/v2/DataView/runtime" xmlns:asp="http://schemas.microsoft.com/ASPNET/20" xmlns:__designer="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebParts/v2/DataView/designer" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:msxsl="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xslt" xmlns:SharePoint="Microsoft.SharePoint.WebControls" xmlns:ddwrt2="urn:frontpage:internal">
	<xsl:output method="html" indent="no"/>
	<xsl:decimal-format NaN=""/>
	<xsl:param name="dvt_apos">&apos;</xsl:param>
	<xsl:param name="ManualRefresh"></xsl:param>
	<xsl:variable name="dvt_1_automode">0</xsl:variable>
	<xsl:template match="/" xmlns:x="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:dsp="http://schemas.microsoft.com/sharepoint/dsp" xmlns:asp="http://schemas.microsoft.com/ASPNET/20" xmlns:__designer="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebParts/v2/DataView/designer" xmlns:SharePoint="Microsoft.SharePoint.WebControls">
		<xsl:choose>
			<xsl:when test="($ManualRefresh = 'True')">
				<table width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
					<tr>
						<td valign="top">
							<xsl:call-template name="dvt_1"/>
						</td>
						<td width="1%" class="ms-vb" valign="top">
							<img src="/_layouts/15/images/staticrefresh.gif" id="ManualRefresh" border="0" onclick="javascript: {ddwrt:GenFireServerEvent('__cancel')}" alt="Click here to refresh the dataview."/></td>
					</tr>
				</table>
			</xsl:when>
			<xsl:otherwise>
				<xsl:call-template name="dvt_1"/>
			</xsl:otherwise>
		</xsl:choose>
	</xsl:template>
	
	<xsl:template name="dvt_1">
		<xsl:variable name="dvt_StyleName">ListForm</xsl:variable>
		<xsl:variable name="Rows" select="/dsQueryResponse/Rows/Row"/>
		<div>
			<span id="part1">
				<table border="0" width="100%">
					<xsl:call-template name="dvt_1.body">
						<xsl:with-param name="Rows" select="$Rows"/>
					</xsl:call-template>
				</table>
			</span>
			<SharePoint:AttachmentUpload runat="server" ControlMode="New"/>
			<SharePoint:ItemHiddenVersion runat="server" ControlMode="New"/>
		</div>
	</xsl:template>
	<xsl:template name="dvt_1.body">
		<xsl:param name="Rows"/>
		<tr>
			<td class="ms-toolbar" nowrap="nowrap">
				<table>
					<tr>
						<td width="99%" class="ms-toolbar" nowrap="nowrap"><IMG SRC="/_layouts/15/images/blank.gif" width="1" height="18"/></td>
						<td class="ms-toolbar" nowrap="nowrap">
							<span id="_areaRequestApproval" name="_areaRequestApproval">
								<input type="button" id="_btnTmpSave" Name="_btnTmpSave" class="btnTmpSave" value="임시저장" />
								<input type="button" id="_btnRequestApprove" Name="_btnRequestApprove" class="btnRequestApprove" value="결재요청" />
								<input type="button" id="_btnAprLine" Name="_btnTmpSave" class="btnAprLine" value="결재선지정" />
							</span>
						</td>
						<td class="ms-toolbar" nowrap="nowrap">
							<SharePoint:SaveButton runat="server" ControlMode="New" id="savebutton1" CssClass="btnsave" ClientIDMode="Static"/>
						</td>
						<td class="ms-separator">&#160;</td>
						<td class="ms-toolbar" nowrap="nowrap" align="right">
							<SharePoint:GoBackButton runat="server" ControlMode="New" id="gobackbutton1"/>
						</td>
					</tr>
				</table>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td class="ms-toolbar" nowrap="nowrap">
				<SharePoint:FormToolBar runat="server" ControlMode="New"/>
				<SharePoint:ItemValidationFailedMessage runat="server" ControlMode="New"/>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<xsl:call-template name="dvt_1.rowedit"/>
		<tr>
			<td class="ms-toolbar" nowrap="nowrap">
				<table>
					<tr>
						<td width="99%" class="ms-toolbar" nowrap="nowrap"><IMG SRC="/_layouts/15/images/blank.gif" width="1" height="18"/></td>
						<td class="ms-toolbar" nowrap="nowrap">

								<input type="button" id="_btnTmpSave" Name="_btnTmpSave" class="btnTmpSave" value="임시저장" />

					</tr>
				</table>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</xsl:template>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:x="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:dsp="http://schemas.microsoft.com/sharepoint/dsp" version="1.0" exclude-result-prefixes="xsl msxsl ddwrt" xmlns:ddwrt="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebParts/v2/DataView/runtime" xmlns:asp="http://schemas.microsoft.com/ASPNET/20" xmlns:__designer="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebParts/v2/DataView/designer" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:msxsl="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xslt" xmlns:SharePoint="Microsoft.SharePoint.WebControls" xmlns:ddwrt2="urn:frontpage:internal">

			</xsl:otherwise>

							</span>
							<span id="_areaApproval" name="_areaApproval">
								<input type="button" id="_btnApprove" Name="_btnApprove" value="승인" />
								<input type="button" id="_btnReject" Name="_btnReject" value="반려" />
							</span>
							<span id="_areaReview" name="_areaReview">
								<input type="button" id="_btnAgreeReview" Name="_btnAgreeReview" value="합의" />
								<input type="button" id="_btnDisagreeReview" Name="_btnDisagreeReview" value="불합의" />
								<input type="button" id="_btnRejectReview" Name="_btnRejectReview" value="반려" />
							</span>
							<span id="_areaPrn" name="_areaReview">
								<input type="button" id="_btnPrint" Name="_btnPrint" value="인쇄" />
							</span>


						</td>
						<td class="ms-toolbar" nowrap="nowrap" align="right">
						</td>
						<td class="ms-toolbar" nowrap="nowrap" align="right">
							<SharePoint:GoBackButton runat="server" ControlMode="Display" id="gobackbutton1"/>
						</td>
					</tr>
				</table>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td class="ms-toolbar" nowrap="nowrap">
				<SharePoint:FormToolBar runat="server" ControlMode="Display"/>
				<SharePoint:ItemValidationFailedMessage runat="server" ControlMode="Display"/>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<xsl:for-each select="$Rows">
			<xsl:call-template name="dvt_1.rowview">
				<xsl:with-param name="Pos" select="concat('_', position())" />
			</xsl:call-template>
			
		</xsl:for-each>
		<tr>
			<td class="ms-toolbar" nowrap="nowrap">
				<table>
					<tr>
						<td class="ms-descriptiontext" nowrap="nowrap">
							<SharePoint:CreatedModifiedInfo ControlMode="Display" runat="server"/>
						</td>
						<td width="99%" class="ms-toolbar" nowrap="nowrap"><IMG SRC="/_layouts/15/images/blank.gif" width="1" height="18"/></td>
						<td class="ms-toolbar" nowrap="nowrap" align="right">
							<SharePoint:GoBackButton runat="server" ControlMode="Display" id="gobackbutton2"/>
						</td>
					</tr>
				</table>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</xsl:template>
	<xsl:template name="dvt_1.rowview">
		<xsl:param name="Pos" />
		<tr>
			<td>
			<!-- 전자 결재 양식 시작 -->
				<div id="eApprovalMainArea">
					<div id="headerArea" style="height:100%; vertical-align:baseline;" >
						<div id="titleText" class="headText">
							<span class="FormTypeTitle" ><xsl:value-of select="@formname"/></span>
						</div>
						<div id="approvalInfo" style="height:100%;float:left">
							<p class="headTitle">
							<span id="hdocNo" class="headLabel">문&#160;서&#160;번&#160;호 :</span>
							<span id="tdocNo"  class="headBody"><xsl:value-of select="@docNo"/></span>
							</p>
							<p class="headTitle">
							<span id="hAuthor"  class="headLabel">작&#160;&#160;&#160;성&#160;&#160;&#160;자</span> : 
							<span id="tAuthor"  class="headBody">
							<SharePoint:CreatedModifiedInfo ControlMode="Display" runat="server">
							        <CustomTemplate>
							            <SharePoint:FieldValue FieldName="Author" runat="server" ControlMode="Display" DisableInputFieldLabel="true" />
							        </CustomTemplate>
							    </SharePoint:CreatedModifiedInfo>
							</span>
							</p>
							<p class="headTitle" >
							<span id="hcreated"  class="headLabel">작&#160;성&#160;일&#160;자</span> : <span id="tcreated" class="headBody"><xsl:value-of select="ddwrt:FormatDate(string(@submitted),1042,5)" /></span>
							</p>
							<p class="headTitle">
							<span id="hsecureLevel"  class="headLabel">보&#160;안&#160;구&#160;분</span> : <span id="tsecureLevel"  class="headBody"><xsl:value-of select="@secureLevel"/></span>

							</p>
							<p class="headTitle">
							<span id="hexpire"  class="headLabel">보&#160;존&#160;연&#160;한 :</span><span id="texpire" class="headBody">3년</span>
							</p>
						</div>
						<div id="approvalLineInfo" align="right">
							<table bordercolor="#000000" style="border: 2px solid rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0); /*font-family: 굴림;*/ font-size: 12px; border-collapse: collapse;" border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
								<tbody>
								<tr>
								<td width="30" align="center" valign="middle" rowspan="4">
								결<br/><br/>재
								</td>
									<td height="22" align="center">검토</td>
									<td height="22" align="center">확인</td>
									<td height="22" align="center">심사</td>
									<td height="22" align="center">승인</td>
								</tr>
								<tr>
									<td width="90" height="70" align="middle" valign="center">
										<img src="../../Approval/Blank.gif" id="imgApr1" class="approver1"></img>
									</td>
									<td width="90" height="70" align="middle" valign="center">
										<img src="../../Approval/Blank.gif" id="imgApr2" class="approver2"></img>
									</td>
									<td width="90" height="70" align="middle" valign="center">
										<img src="../../Approval/Blank.gif" id="imgApr3" class="approver3"></img>
									</td>
									<td width="90" height="70" align="middle" valign="center">
										<img src="../../Approval/Blank.gif" id="imgApr4" class="approver4"></img>					
									</td>
								</tr>
								<tr>
									<td height="22" align="center" valign="middle">
										<xsl:value-of select="@approver1" disable-output-escaping="yes"/>
									</td>
									<td height="22" align="center" valign="middle">
										<xsl:value-of select="@approver2" disable-output-escaping="yes"/>
									</td>
									<td height="22" align="center" valign="middle">
										<xsl:value-of select="@approver3" disable-output-escaping="yes"/>
									</td>
									<td height="22" align="center" valign="middle">
										<xsl:value-of select="@approver4" disable-output-escaping="yes"/>
									</td>
								</tr>
								<tr>
									<td height="22" align="center" valign="middle">
										<xsl:value-of select="@aprStatus1"/>
										<br/>
										<xsl:value-of select="ddwrt:FormatDate(string(@aprDate1),1042,1)" />												
									</td>
									<td height="22" align="center" valign="middle">
										<xsl:value-of select="@aprStatus2"/>
										<br/>
										<xsl:value-of select="ddwrt:FormatDate(string(@aprDate2),1042,1)"/>
									</td>
									<td height="22" align="center" valign="middle">
										<xsl:value-of select="@aprStatus3"/>
										<br/>
										<xsl:value-of select="ddwrt:FormatDate(string(@aprDate3),1042,1)"/>
									</td>
									<td height="22" align="center" valign="middle">
										<xsl:value-of select="@aprStatus4"/>
										<br/>
										<xsl:value-of select="ddwrt:FormatDate(string(@aprDate4),1042,1)"/>
									</td>
								</tr>
								<tr id="rowreviewer">
								<td align="center" valign="middle" style="width:30px;">
								합<br/><b/>의
								</td>
								<td style="width:350px;text-align:left" colspan="4">
								<P id="reviewer" class="reviewer" style="margin-left:10px;"></P> 
								<span style="display:none;"><xsl:value-of select="@reviewer" disable-output-escaping="yes"/></span>
								</td>
								</tr>
								</tbody>
							</table>
							
						</div>
					</div>
					<div id="mainBodyArea" style="clear:both">
						<p class="headTitle">
						<span id="hreferrer"   class="headLabel">참&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;조 :</span>
						<span id="treferrer"   class="headBody"><xsl:value-of select="@referer"/></span>
						</p>
						<p class="headTitle">
						<span id="htitle"  class="headLabel">제&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;목 :</span> 
						<span id="ttitle"  class="headBody"><xsl:value-of select="@Title"/></span>
						</p>
						<hr/>
						<div id="approvalContent">
							<xsl:value-of select="@aprBody" disable-output-escaping="yes"/>
						</div>
						<div id="approvalOpinion">
							<div  class="opinionHeader">
								<div style="width:50px;float:left" >&#160;</div>
								<div style="width:100px;float:left" >결재자</div>
								<div style="width:400px;float:left">결재의견</div>
								<div style="width:140px;float:left" >일자</div>			
							</div>
							<div  class="opinionBody" style="clear:both">
								<div style="width:50px;float:left" >검토</div>
								<div style="width:100px;float:left" class="opinionUser"><xsl:value-of select="@approver1" disable-output-escaping="yes"/></div>
								<div style="width:400px;float:left"><xsl:value-of select="@aprOpinion1"/></div>
								<div style="width:140px;float:left" ><xsl:value-of select="ddwrt:FormatDate(string(@aprDate1),1042,5)" /></div>			
							</div>
							<div  class="opinionBody" style="clear:both">
								<div style="width:50px;float:left" >확인</div>
								<div style="width:100px;float:left"  class="opinionUser" ><xsl:value-of select="@approver2" disable-output-escaping="yes"/></div>
								<div style="width:400px;float:left"><xsl:value-of select="@aprOpinion2"/></div>
								<div style="width:140px;float:left" ><xsl:value-of select="ddwrt:FormatDate(string(@aprDate2),1042,5)" /></div>			
							</div>
							<div  class="opinionBody" style="clear:both">
								<div style="width:50px;float:left" >심사</div>
								<div style="width:100px;float:left"  class="opinionUser" ><xsl:value-of select="@approver3" disable-output-escaping="yes"/></div>
								<div style="width:400px;float:left"><xsl:value-of select="@aprOpinion3"/></div>
								<div style="width:150px;float:left" ><xsl:value-of select="ddwrt:FormatDate(string(@aprDate3),1042,5)" /></div>			
							</div>
							<div  class="opinionBody" id="Reviewopinion"  style="clear:both">
								<div style="width:48px;float:left" >합의</div>
								<div style="width:640px;float:left" class="opinionUser"><table id="opinionReviewer" style="width:100%"></table></div>
							</div>
								<div  class="opinionBody"  style="clear:both">
								<div style="width:50px;float:left" >승인</div>
								<div style="width:100px;float:left"  class="opinionUser"><xsl:value-of select="@approver4" disable-output-escaping="yes"/></div>
								<div style="width:400px;float:left"><xsl:value-of select="@aprOpinion4"/></div>
								<div style="width:150px;float:left" ><xsl:value-of select="ddwrt:FormatDate(string(@aprDate4),1042,5)" /></div>			
							</div>
						</div>
						<div id="approvalAttachment">
							<SharePoint:FieldLabel ControlMode="Display" FieldName="Attachments" runat="server"/>
							<SharePoint:FormField runat="server" id="AttachmentsField" ControlMode="Display" FieldName="Attachments" __designer:bind="{ddwrt:DataBind('u','AttachmentsField','Value','ValueChanged','ID',ddwrt:EscapeDelims(string(@ID)),'@Attachments')}"/>
							<script>
					          var elm = document.getElementById(&quot;idAttachmentsTable&quot;);
					          if (elm == null || elm.rows.length == 0)
					          document.getElementById(&quot;approvalAttachment&quot;).style.display=&apos;none&apos;;
					        </script>
						</div>
					</div>
				</div>
				<!-- 전자 결재 양식 시작 끝-->
				
				<!-- 승인, 반려 의견 입력 -->
				<div id="dialog-form" title="결재 의견입력" style="display:none">
				  <p class="validateTips" style="font-family:돋움;font-size:9pt;">결재의견을 입력하세요.</p>	
				  <p class="invalidateTips" style="font-family:돋움;font-size:9pt;color:red;display:none"></p>			
				  <fieldset>
				    <label for="name" style="font-family:돋움;font-size:9pt;">의견</label>
					<textarea id="_opinion" name="_opinion"  style="width: 295px; height: 100px;"></textarea>				
				  </fieldset>
				  <input type="hidden" id="_opinionType" name="_opinionType" /></div>
				<!-- 승인, 반려 의견 입력 끝-->
			</td>
		</tr>
		
	</xsl:template>
	<xsl:template name="dvt_1.empty">
		<xsl:variable name="dvt_ViewEmptyText">이 보기에 표시할 항목이 없습니다.</xsl:variable>
		<table border="0" width="100%">
			<tr>
				<td class="ms-vb">
					<xsl:value-of select="$dvt_ViewEmptyText"/>
				</td>
			</tr>
		</table>
		
	</xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>
